"The Chocolate Way 3":
"This is an unofficial request from me, Xie!
The Naura Cake Shop is back for a limited
time only, right in the heart of Amduscia's
Volcanic Caves! And this year, the girls are
giving out handmade chocolate!
Maybe they'll give you some if you help
them? I hope the girl you've got your eye
on notices you!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
